directions: Place ice cubes in a blender; add soy milk, peanut butter, carob powder, and agave nectar. Blend mixture until smooth and thicken.
ingredients: 2 tablespoons crunchy peanut butter, or to taste
1 teaspoon carob powder, or more to taste
1 teaspoon agave nectar, or more to taste
title: Vegan Snickers® Ice Cream
